name: Chromablast 2017
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL MONTREAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Dive into a retro-futuristic China, with an outside world destroyed beyond repair, two factions battle each other inside a simulation they both want to control. As a member of the Rebels or the Corporates, toss energy blasts et play with your opponent’s mind. Will you strive for order, or freedom?

Number of players : 2
Platform : PC
Engine : Unity 3D

Producer : Yoan LE SOUDER
Game Design : Christophe AFFLATET, Benjamin BRIOLAT,  Philippe DUHAMEL, Theo GHANIME, Yoan LE SOUDER, Antoine LUCAS
Game Artist : Raphaël CHEVALIER, Daryl KIDJO, Joana MEDEIROS
